AvenueQ:
The sun is shining, it's a lovely day,
阳光明媚是一天好时光	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -9 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
A perfect morning for a kid to play,
完美的早晨适合孩子玩	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But you're got lots of bills to pay
可你有好多账要结	(rhyme type: 3 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What can you do?
你能怎样	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Your work real hard and the pay's real low
你很努力工作但工资很少	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And every hour goes oh, so slow
时间过的好慢好慢	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And at the end of the day there's no where to go
到最后却原来已无处可去可逃	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Back home to Avenue Q
回到了街区大道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
YouAreNotAlone:
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
你是否曾感到无人陪伴呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
你可曾感到在茫茫人海中被遗忘了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Have you ever felt like you could disappear
你有没有感到可以消失的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Like you could fall and no one would hear
像是坠入了无人的夜	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -9 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)

Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
让那孤单的感伤被冲掉	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
也许还有理由相信你会过的很好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
因为你没有力量去站立	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You can reach, reach out your hand
伸手就能够得到	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Even when the dark comes crashing through
即使黑暗笼罩而至时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -9 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
When you need a friend to carry you
当你需要朋友来载你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And when you're broken on the ground
当你在地上崩溃时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You will be found
会找到你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

So let the sun come streaming in
让阳光洒进来灿烂	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -9 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
因为你会站起来再战	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Lift your head and look around
抬起头四处张望	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You will be found
你会发现	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
OnlyUs:
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
我不想要你出售理由来说服我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
不需要你搜寻我该有的证明	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -5 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You don't have to convince me
不用你来说服我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
不用害怕自己还不够多	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
'Cause what we've got going is good
因为我们已很好了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
所有伤了断了的我已不需要提	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
不用你修理我宁愿选择忘记	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Clear the slate and start over
一切从头再开始	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Try to quiet the noises in your head
试着静下你脑海的喧哗	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We can't compete with all that
那些我们比不起	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

So what if it's us?
就算我们呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
What if it's us And only us
只有我们怎么办呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
那些过往的伤痛都不再重要了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Can we try that?
试试看呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

What if it's you
若是你呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if it's me
而如果是我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And what if that's all that we need it to be
而如果这正是我们需要的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And the rest of the world falls away?
世界就只剩下你和我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
What do you say?
你说什么	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
从没想过会有你这样的人会想要我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
于是我给你一万个理由不放开我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But if you really see me
但你若真的看到我	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
If you like me for me and nothing else
若你喜欢我而别无所求	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -5 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
对我的渴望已超过你能够所知道的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -4 len_constraint: 16 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
IMissTheMountains:
All these blank and tranquil years
空白的岁月静好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Seems they've dried up all my tears
似乎已风干泪痕	(rhyme type: 11 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
And while she runs free and fast
她自由自在奔跑	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Seems my wild days are past
仿佛不羁年少	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)

But I miss the mountains
可我怀念山里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I miss the dizzy heights
怀念晕眩之巅	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the manic magic days
所有的疯狂日子	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And the dark depressing nights
和压抑的夜色里	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)

I miss the mountains
怀念山水间	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
I miss the highs and lows
怀念高低起伏	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
All the climbing all the falling
所有的攀爬和跌倒	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
All the while the wild wind blows
野风吹不停歇啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Stinging you with snow
刺你一身雪	(rhyme type: 3 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
And soaking you with rain
还为你淋着雨	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I miss the mountains
怀念山水间	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
I miss the pain
想念痛楚	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
YouDontKnow:
Do you wake up in the morning
每天清晨是否醒来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And need help to lift your head
需要帮忙抬起头	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Do you read obituaries
你可曾读讣告吗	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And feel jealous of the dead
嫉妒那些已故者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It's like living on a cliffside
像生活在悬崖峭壁	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Not knowing when you'll dive
不知何时潜去	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Do you know, Do you know
你知么你知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -5 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
What it's like to die alive
死去活来的滋味	(rhyme type: 7 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

When a world that once had color
当曾经色彩斑斓的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Fades to white and grey and black
褪成白灰黑的斑驳	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
When tomorrow terrifies you
当明天令你害怕时	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
But you'll die if you look back
但回头便死定了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

You don't know
你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know you don't know
知你不知晓	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You say that you're hurting
你说你很痛心	(rhyme type: 11 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It sure doesn't show
显而易见	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You don't know
你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -2 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
It lays me so low
使我心沉重	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
When you say let go
当你说放手	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And I say You don't know
我说你不知道	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -7 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Popular:
Whenever I see someone less fortunate than I
每当我看到比我不幸运的人们	(rhyme type: 11 scores: -6 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And let's face it
且放胆去	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -6 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
Who isn't less fortunate than I?
谁不曾不如意一场	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -9 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
My tender heart tends to start to bleed
温柔的心却容易受伤	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -9 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

And when someone needs a makeover
当有人需要改变时啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I simply have to take over!
我就是得掌权了啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I know, I know exactly what they need!
我知道他们需要的是啥	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

And even in your case
而即使你的话	(rhyme type: 1 scores: 6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
Though it's the toughest case I've yet to face
虽然是最难啃的一块肉	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Don't worry, I'm determined to succeed!
别担心我一定会有成就	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Follow my lead
跟着我走	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -8 len_constraint: 4 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

you will be Popular!
你会大红大紫	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
You're gonna be popular!
你将会大红大紫	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I'll teach you the proper poise
教你正确的姿势	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
When you talk to boys
对男生说话	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Little ways to flirt and flounce
轻巧舞步引人迷	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -9 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)

I'll show you what shoes to wear!
让你们看看穿啥	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
How to fix your hair!
头发怎么扎	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Everything that really counts to be...
那些真正重要的东西啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
POPULAR!
流行啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I'll help you be popular!
我会帮你流行啊	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

You'll hang with the right cohorts
与你结伴到天边	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
You'll be good at sports
运动会很棒	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -7 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Know the slang you've got to know
识得江湖道中人	(rhyme type: 11 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
So let's start
开始吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -6 len_constraint: 3 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
'Cause you've got an awfully long way to go!
因为你的路还长很长很长	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Don't be offended by my frank analysis
不要被我坦率的分析得罪了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Think of it as personality dialysis
就当作是人格的透析好不好	(rhyme type: 8 scores: -5 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Now that I've chosen to become a Pal, a sis or an advisor
既然我选择成为闺蜜或者顾问那个角色	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 17 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
There's nobody wiser!
没有谁能更睿智	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Not when it comes to POPULAR!
流行起来才精彩呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I know about popular
我知道流行的事	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -6 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And with an assist from me
加上我的助攻呢	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
To be who you'll be
成为你未来	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -5 len_constraint: 5 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Instead of dreary who you were...
与其沉闷的过去的	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
There's nothing that can stop you From becoming popu-ler...
没有什么能够阻挡你成为万人迷了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 15 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
RevoltingChildren:
Never again will she get the best of me,
再也不会成为她的附庸者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -9 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 3)
Never again will she take away my freedom,
她再也不能剥夺我的自由了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And we won't forget the day we fought for the right to be a little bit naughty.
我们不会忘记那一天我们争取调皮的权利那天	(rhyme type: 10 scores: -6 len_constraint: 20 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again, will the chokey door slam.
再也敲不开那扇牢门了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Never again, will I be bullied and
再也不会让我被欺负了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
再也不会怀疑了当我的妈咪说我是奇迹了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 18 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Never again will we live behind doors
我们将不再活在门后了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

We are revolting children, living in revolting times
我们是叛逆的孩子活在叛逆时代	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -5 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
我们唱着反歌用反调押韵儿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done,
我们会一直反抗直到我们胜利	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
我们将要驱逐恶棍老师起义	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Six:
He got down on one knee but I said no way
他单膝下跪但我说没门儿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -5 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Packed my bags and moved into a nu nu nunneray
收拾了行李搬进了一个女修道者	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Joined the gospel choir, our riffs were on fire
教堂合唱团的合声火了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
At the top of the charts is where I'm gonna stay
在排行榜的顶端才是我的窝	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Henry sent me a poem all about my green sleeves
贺知章寄诗书一封说绿袖思乡愁	(rhyme type: 9 scores: -6 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
I changed a couple words put it on a sick beat
我换了几句词放了一个节拍	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -6 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
The song blew their minds, next minute I was signed
他们听完歌就马上签我了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
And now I'm writing lyrics for Shakesy P
如今我却为薛之谦写歌词了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)

Since my first son, our family's grown
自从第一个儿子出生	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We made a band and got quite well known
我们组了乐队出名了	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
You could perhaps call us the Tudor Von Trapps
称我们为都铎冯特拉普氏	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
I'm just kidding, we're called the Royalling Stones
开玩笑我们叫皇家顽石	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

We're one of a kind no category
我们是独一无二的品种	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -5 len_constraint: 10 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Too many years lost in his story
在他故事里迷失太多	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We're free to take, our crowning glory
自由自在的取舍不羁	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
For five more minutes
再撑上五分钟	(rhyme type: 13 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
We're Six
六儿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 2 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

What a shame yeah my face it cost me the crown
多可惜是啊我失冠之脸儿	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
So I moved to the Haus of Holbein in my hometown
于是搬迁到故乡的豪斯霍芬故居	(rhyme type: 5 scores: -6 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
His mates were super arty, but I showed them how to party
他的伙伴们很文艺但我让他们乐开怀	(rhyme type: 6 scores: -5 len_constraint: 16 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
Now on my tour of Prussia everybody gets down
现在在普鲁士巡回演唱会开始	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 13 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

Music man tried it on and I was like bye
音乐人试过后我像拜拜啦	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
So I thought "Who needs him?", I can give it a try
我想既然这样何必非得有他	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -8 len_constraint: 12 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
I learned everything, Now all I do is sing
我学会了一切现在我唱歌	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -5 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
And I'll do that until I die
而我会做到到死吧	(rhyme type: 1 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)

Heard all about these rockin' chicks
听说这群摇滚少女	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Loved every song and each remix
每首歌都爱的着迷	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
So I went out and found them, And we lay down an album
所以我出去找到了他们录制专辑	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 14 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Now I don't need your love, all I need is Six
我不要你的爱我只要西施	(rhyme type: 4 scores: 4 len_constraint: 11 reward12: 2 reward3: 2)
WavingThroughAWindow:
Step out, step out of the sun
走出阳光的天地	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -7 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 2)
If you keep getting burned
如继续被灼伤	(rhyme type: 12 scores: -6 len_constraint: 6 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
Step out, step out of the sun
踏出太阳的足迹	(rhyme type: 4 scores: -8 len_constraint: 7 reward12: 3 reward3: 3)
Because you've learned, because you've learned
因为你学会因为你	(rhyme type: 4 scores: 5 len_constraint: 8 reward12: 1 reward3: 2)

On the outside always looking in
总是在远处遥遥望着	(rhyme type: 2 scores: -6 len_constraint: 9 reward12: 4 reward3: 2)
